exchange.name: binance

bot_settings._comment_paper_trading: IMPORTANT: Set to FALSE to trade real money!
bot_settings._comment_balance: Your USDT balance: 1,000 pesos = ~18 USDT, 5,000 pesos = ~95 USDT

strategy_parameters._comment_quality: Minimum 4 stars = only trade excellent setups (v2.1 logic)

risk_management._comment_daily_trades: 1 trade/day max (can change to 2-3 if you want)

time_settings._comment_times: All times in EST (9:30 AM EST = 10:30 PM Manila)

notifications._comment_telegram: Optional: Get trade alerts on Telegram

_instructions.step_1: Get API keys from Binance (Profile > API Management)
_instructions.step_3: Set initial_balance to your USDT amount (18 for 1,000 pesos, 95 for 5,000 pesos)
_instructions.step_4: Set max_position_size_usd to same as initial_balance
_instructions.step_5: Test with paper_trading = true first (1-3 days)
_instructions.step_6: When ready, change paper_trading to false
_instructions.WARNING: You can lose money! Start small, monitor closely!
